title: The Flute Song
lyrics:
Legend
People keep talkin'
I believe (yeah)
I do whatever I want, whenever I want
I love it

People keep talking, I just keep winning

I'm just like "Fuck it"

They talkin' reckless, I don't believe 'em, I think they bluffin'

Just because they want clout, I'm just so poppin'

I be like "Fuck it"



Everybody tryna get a rise out of me (yeah)

Ex girls tryna get a "Hi" to me (yeah)

I don't talk back 'less you're worthy (no)

Hangin' plaques up like jerseys (sauce)

25 racks for lies on me

My family relies on me

Three five soles at my home, no uh

Walkin' 'round in slippers and a robe, oh

And important of course, the industry is full of some hoes

They'll let like anything go

People are shady as fuck

I keep to myself, but I feel the energy though

None of these people are my friends though

I don't put anything past them

I don't see none of y'all next to me though

I think they're mad that I passed them



I do whatever I want, whenever I want

I love it (woo, woo)

People keep talking, I just keep winning

I'm just like "Fuck it"

They talkin' reckless, I don't believe 'em, I think they bluffin' (they just be talkin')

Just because they want clout, I'm just so poppin'

I'm just like "Fuck it" (yeah, yeah)

I do whatever I want, whenever I want

I love it (woo, woo)

People keep talking, I just keep winning

I'm just like "Fuck it"

They talkin' reckless, I don't believe 'em, I think they bluffin' (they just be talkin')

Just because they want clout, I'm just so poppin'

I'm just like "Fuck it" (yeah)



I been goin' hard on my Kobe number eight shit

Posers gonna hate but I signed up for greatness

That comes with the territory, ain't no way around it, I know with that

I been way up in the hills reflectin', I cannot go back

Beverly Hills, skyline view

I move smart, got a high IQ

Right next to me you will find my crew

All of them fight, bitch, I fight too

Highlight moves every time I play

I get what I want every time I pray

I be doin' good but they don't wanna talk about it

If you really got a grip with my life I sayâ€“



I do whatever I want, whenever I want

I love it (woo, woo)

People keep talking, I just keep winning

I'm just like "Fuck it"

They talkin' reckless, I don't believe 'em, I think they bluffin' (they just be talkin')

Just because they want clout, I'm just so poppin'

I'm just like "Fuck it" (yeah, yeah)

I do whatever I want, whenever I want

I love it (woo, woo)

People keep talking, I just keep winning

I'm just like "Fuck it"

They talkin' reckless, I don't believe 'em, I think they bluffin' (they just be talkin')

Just because they want clout, I'm just so poppin'

I'm just like "Fuck it" (yeah)
